thread.title: Blackberry Priv is now available for pre-order in U.S., U.K., and Canada for $699
thread.title_full: Blackberry Priv is now available for pre-order in U.S., U.K., and Canada for $699 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Blackberry Priv is now available for pre-order in U.S., U.K., and Canada for $699
text: Blackberry is officially accepting pre-orders for its new Android based smartphone. Priv was first announced last month. The phone features a touch screen, slide out keyboard, and Blackberry’s security software. The phone is first being made available in the U.S., U.K., and Canada for $699, £549, and $899 CND respectively. Blackberry hasn’t yet announced when the phones will […] »
